name: Metrail
description:
Metrail is a simple, music driven experience, made as an introduction to some of Oddscure's music. It contains three levels, each having "chords" and "notes" following the track. The notes are one-shots, while chords require the correct keys to be held down to pass through.

Features:
  • 3 tracks/levels
  • Simple gameplay
  • Atmospheric music
